page.title: 14INDUSTRY EGMANTON
page.content: A civil engineer/contracter is the largest employer in the area. The office, garage and workshop are situated in the centre of Egmanton. Some 15 people are employed, many are from nearby larger villages. Drainage schemes, land fill and road surfacing are the companies main tasks. Egmanton villagers have cause to be grateful in winter when the snow plough starts work from the Main street. Another garage and workshop in Egmanton is helping to solve the rural transport problem of the young by retailing motor cycles.
